titles.title: I Shall Not Be, I Shall Not Be Moved

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I shall not be, I shall not be moved.
I shall not be, I shall not be moved.
Just like a tree, planted by the water,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'm anchored on the rock, I shall not be moved. (2x)
I'm anchored on the rock, I shall not be moved. (2x)
Just like a tree, planted by the water,
I shall not be moved.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The devil is a liar, I shall not be moved, etc.
Jesus is my Savior, I shall not be moved, etc.
I've got the Holy Ghost, I shall not be moved, etc.
He wipes away my sins and I shall not be moved, etc.
